Traits.Name: Ethereal Form
Traits.Content: The Ectoplasm can move through solid objects as if they were difficult terrain and can pass through walls without leaving a trace.

Traits.Name: Binding Presence
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the Ectoplasm must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be restrained until the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Ectoplasm makes two attacks: one with its Binding Tendril and one with its Ethereal Grasp.

Actions.Name: Binding Tendril
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 9 (1d10 + 4) psychic damage with a reach of 10 ft. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be restrained by the tendril until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Ethereal Grasp
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 11 (2d6 + 4) necrotic damage with a reach of 5 ft. The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Seeping Residue
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 6 (1d8 + 2) acid damage with a range of 150/600 ft. On a hit, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn as the residue adheres to its limbs.
